Overview.label: Overview
Overview.heading: Overview Table
Overview.Title: Name of policy or measure
Overview.Table1: Table 1: Sectors and gases for reporting on policies and measures and groups of measures, and type of policy instrument
Overview.Table2: Table 2: Available results of ex-ante and ex-post assessments of the effects of individual or groups of policies and measures on mitigation of climate change
Overview.Table3: Table 3: Available projected and realised costs and benefits of individual or groups of policies and measures on mitigation of climate change

Table1.Title: Name of PAM or group of PAMs

isGroup.label: Is this a single PAM or a group of PAMs?

PolicyGroup.label: Which policies or measures does it cover?

list.Energy_Supply: Energy supply (comprising extraction, transmission, distribution and storage of fuels as well as energy and electricity production)
list.Energy_Consumption: Energy consumption (comprising consumption of fuels and electricity by end users such as households, services, industry and agriculture)
list.Industrial_Processes: Industrial processes (comprising industrial activities that chemically or physically transform materials leading to greenhouse gas emissions, use of greenhouse gases in products and non-energy uses of fossil fuel carbon)
list.LULUCF: Land use, land-use change and forestry

shortlist.LULUCF: Land use, land-use change and forestry

Objective.label: Objective(s)
Objective.emptySectors: You need to select at least one Sector to view and select Objectives

list.ES_efficiency: Efficiency improvement in the energy and transformation sector
list.ES_fugitive_emissions: Control of fugitive emissions from energy production
list.EC_efficiency_services: Efficiency improvement in services/ tertiary sector
list.EC_efficiency_industry: Efficiency improvement in industrial end-use sectors
list.TR_modal_shift: Modal shift to public transport or non-motorized transport
list.IP_F-gas_reduction: Reduction of emissions of fluorinated gases
list.IP_F-gas_replacement: Replacement of fluorinated gases by other substances
list.IP_fugitive_emissions_control: Improved control of fugitive emissions from industrial processes
list.AG_Fertilizer_use: Reduction of fertilizer/manure use on cropland
list.AG_grazing_land_or_grassland: Activities improving grazing land or grassland management
list.LULUCF_carbon_conservation: Conservation of carbon in existing forests
list.LULUCF_hwp_pool: Increasing the harvested wood products pool
list.LULUCF_substitution_with_HWP: Substitution of GHG-intensive feedstocks and materials with harvested wood products
list.LULUCF_wetlands: Prevention of drainage or rewetting of wetlands

list_with_sectors.ES_Fuels_witch: Switch to less carbon-intensive fuels (Energy supply)
list_with_sectors.ES_nuclear: Enhanced non-renewable low carbon generation (nuclear) (Energy supply)
list_with_sectors.ES_efficiency: Efficiency improvement in the energy and transformation sector (Energy supply)
list_with_sectors.ES_fugitive_emissions: Control of fugitive emissions from energy production (Energy supply)
list_with_sectors.EC_efficiency_services: Efficiency improvement in services/ tertiary sector (Energy consumption)
list_with_sectors.EC_efficiency_industry: Efficiency improvement in industrial end-use sectors (Energy consumption)
list_with_sectors.TR_modal_shift: Modal shift to public transport or non-motorized transport (Transport)
list_with_sectors.IP_F-gas_reduction: Reduction of emissions of fluorinated gases (Industrial processes)
list_with_sectors.IP_F-gas_replacement: Replacement of fluorinated gases by other substances (Industrial processes)
list_with_sectors.IP_fugitive_emissions_control: Improved control of fugitive emissions from industrial processes (Industrial processes)
list_with_sectors.AG_Fertilizer_use: Reduction of fertilizer/manure use on cropland (Agriculture)
list_with_sectors.AG_grazing_land_or_grassland: Activities improving grazing land or grassland management (Agriculture)
list_with_sectors.LULUCF_carbon_conservation: Conservation of carbon in existing forests (LULUCF)
list_with_sectors.LULUCF_hwp_pool: Increasing the harvested wood products pool (LULUCF)
list_with_sectors.LULUCF_substitution_with_HWP: Substitution of GHG-intensive feedstocks and materials with harvested wood products (LULUCF)
list_with_sectors.LULUCF_wetlands: Prevention of drainage or rewetting of wetlands (LULUCF)

isEnvisaged.label: Is the policy or measure envisaged with a view to limiting GHG emissions beyond the Member State commitments under Decision No 406/2009/EC?

UnionPolicy.label: Union policy which resulted in the implementation of the PAM:

list.ETS_directive: EU ETS directive 2003/87/EC as amended by Directive 2008/101/EC and Directive 2009/29/EC and implementing legislation, in particular 2010/2/EU, 2011/278/EU and 2011/638/EU
list.CO2_and_cars_and_vans_regulations: Regulation on CO2 from cars and vans (2009/443/EC and no. 510/2011)
list.Cap_reform: CAP Reform 2013 regulations: Rural Development (1305/2013), 'Horizontal' issues (1306/2013), Direct payments (1307/2013) and Market measures (1308/2013)
list.Recast_of_EPBD: Recast of the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (Directive 2010/31/EU)
list.Eco-design_Labelling_directives: Eco-design framework directive 2005/32/EC and its implementing regulations, combined with Labelling Directive 2003/66/EC and 2010/30/EC, including implementing measures
list.Geological_storage: Directive on the geological storage of CO2 2009/31/EC
list.End-use_and_energy_services: Directive 2006/32/EC on end-use energy efficiency and energy services
list.Internal_energy_market: Completion of the internal energy market (including provisions of the 3d package)
list.IED: Industrial emissions Directive 2010/75/EU (Recast of IPPC Directive 2008/1/EC and Large Combustion Plant Directive 2001/80/EC)
list.NEC: Directive on national emissions' ceilings for certain pollutants 2001/81/EC
list.Euro_6_for_HDV: Regulation Euro VI for heavy duty vehicles 2009/595/EC
list.CAP_Health_Check_and_Set_aside: CAP “Health Check” 2008 and the “Set aside” regulation 73/2009
list.Eurovignette_Directive: Eurovignette Directive on road infrastructure charging 2011/76/EU
list.Clean_and_Energy_Efficient_Vehicles: Directive on the Promotion of Clean and Energy Efficient Road Transport Vehicles 2009/33/EC
list.Other_EU: Other (Union policy not listed above or additional Union policy)
list.Non_EU-related_PAM: PAM not related to Union policies

list.Expired: Expired (only if the policy or measure has an effect, or is expected to continue to have an effect on greenhouse gas emissions)

ProjectionsScenario.label: Projections scenario in which the PAM is included:

list.NIP: Not included in a projection scenario

Entities.label: Entities responsible for implementing the policy:

Indicators.label: Indicators used to monitor and evaluate progress over time (ex-post or ex-ante):

Reference.label: Reference to assessments and underpinning technical reports:

PolicyImpact.label: Policy impacting EU ETS or ESD emissions:
PolicyImpact.placeholder: Select Policy impacting EU ETS or ESD emissions
PolicyImpact.LULUCF: Land use, land-use change and forestry

ExanteEmissions.label: GHG emissions reductions for year {{year}} (kt CO2-equivalent per year)

ExpostEmissions.label: GHG emissions reductions (kt CO2-equivalent per year):

BasisExplanation.label: Explanation of the basis for the mitigation estimates:

Documentation.label: Documentation/ Source of estimation if available:

Costs.CostReduced: Costs in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/ sequestered:
Costs.Benefit: Benefits in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/ sequestered:
Costs.NetCost: Net costs in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/ sequestered:
Costs.CostPerYear: Absolute costs per year in EUR:
Costs.BenefitPerYear: Absolute benefit per year in EUR:
Costs.NetCostPerYear: Net Cost per year in EUR:
Costs.CostCalculatedYear: Year(s) for which cost has been calculated:
Costs.BenefitCalculatedYear: Year(s) for which benefits has been calculated:
Costs.NetCostCalculatedYear: Year(s) for which net cost has been calculated:
Costs.CostDescription: Description of cost estimates (basis for cost estimate, what type of costs are included in the estimate, methodology):
Costs.BenefitDescription: Description of benefit estimates (basis for benefit estimate, what type of benefits are included in the estimate, methodology):

Tooltip.MMR: Definitions and information on mandatory reporting requirements are stipulated in MMR Art. 13 and MMR implementing regulation Art. 22 and Annex XI.
Tooltip.Overview: Numeric values with decimals should be entered using a dot not a comma.
Tooltip.Group: A group of PAMs consists of other single PAMs.

Table1.Title: Fill this table with PAMs and groups of PAMs.
Table1.isGroup: A group of PAMs consists of other single PAMs.
Table1.PolicyGroup: One PAM cannot be part of more than one group.
Table1.Sectors: More than one sector can be selected
Table1.GreenhouseGases: More than one GHG can be selected.
Table1.Objective: More than one objective can be selected, additional objectives could be added and specified under ‘other’
Table1.QuantifiedObjective: Include the figure(s) if the objective(s) is (are) quantified.
Table1.UnionPolicy: More than one Union policy can be selected, additional union policies could be added and specified under ‘other’.
Table1.ImplementationStatus: Expired PAMs must be reported in the template only if they have an effect, or they are expected to continue to have an effect on GHG emissions.
Table1.Entities: More than one entity can be selected.

Table2.Title: Fill this table for all PAMs or groups of PAMs for which an ex-post or ex-ante assessment is available
Table2.PolicyImpacting: More than one can be selected.

Table3.Title: Fill this table for all PAMs or groups of PAMs for which such an assessment is available.
Table3.CostCalculatedYear: Provide a year or a range of years (e.g 2000-2014)
Table3.CostDescription: Basis for cost estimate, what type of costs are included in the estimate, methodology.
Table3.BenefitDescription: Basis for benefit estimate, what type of benefits are included in the estimate, methodology.

Validation.url: This field requires a valid url e.g http://www.europa.eu or www.europa.eu
Validation.range_number: This field requires a number between {{min}} and {{max}}
Validation.range_year: This field requires a year between {{min}} and {{max}}
Validation.range_years: This field requires a year or a range of years between {{min}} and {{max}}
Validation.positive: This field requires a number greater than zero
Validation.negative: This field requires a number less than zero
